casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brandon MALONE 379A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 31, 2018 Paul M. Green, Durham, Attorney at Law, for Malone, Brandon Mr. Jess D. Mekeel, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. James Ryan Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Malone, Brandon

Mr. Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State *627The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 31st of May 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of May 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 6th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
